H0.text: In which city would you find the International Court of Justice, otherwise known as The World Court. Geneva

H1.text: In which city would you find the International Court of Justice, otherwise known as The World Court. New York City

H2.text: In which city would you find the International Court of Justice, otherwise known as The World Court. The Hague

H3.text: In which city would you find the International Court of Justice, otherwise known as The World Court. Lahey

A4.text: The ICJ is seated in the Peace Palace in The Hague, Netherlands

A5.text: the only principal UN organ not located in New York City
